problems.title: Minimum Window Substring Containing All Characters
problems.description:
Given two strings s and t, find the length of the smallest substring of s that contains all the characters of t (including duplicates). If no such substring exists, print -1.

Input Format:
First line: string s (no spaces).
Second line: string t (no spaces).

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the length of the smallest window, or -1 if it does not exist.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
ADOBECODEBANC
ABC

Sample Output
4

Explanation:
The minimum window substring is 'BANC' with length 4.
hintsList: Use two frequency maps: one for t and one for the current window in s.
Expand the window to satisfy all characters, then shrink from the left while still satisfying the condition to minimize the window length.
